mutants.code:
def minimum_missiles_to_kill_monsters(n, r, monster_positions):
    unique_positions = sorted(set(monster_positions))
    left = 1
    right = len(unique_positions) - 1
    missiles_count = 1
    current_range = r
    while left < right:
        if left - right == 1:
            missiles_count += 1
            break
        if current_range >= unique_positions[left]:
            left += 1
        else:
            right -= 1
            current_range += r
            missiles_count += 1
    return missiles_count
